Однозначно лучшая игра от Valve. Вторая часть шагнула далеко вперёд по сравнению с первой, она стала на порядок длиннее, много всего нового было добавленов игру, графика на уровне, весьма порадовала русская локализация, «Бука» постарались, что до сюжета, он интересный, даже местами неожиданный, концовка так вообще лучшее, что я видел (и это точно). Я очень надеюсь, что когда - нибудь, в свет выйдет третья часть! (но это не точно).

Gdy 6 lat temu znalazłem ten tytuł niesądziłem że może być ciekawy , jedynka średnio mi sie podobała , ale gdy teraz kupiłem sobie Valve Pack doceniłem tę gre.Genialny Humor , udzwiękowanie oraz postacie choć jest ich mało :P

Игра, которой возраст не помеха. Все еще вкатывает. Отличный сюжет, еще более отличный кооператив, приятная глазу графика. Обязательно к прохождению всем, кто хочет насладиться этим шедевром, или просто сломать голову себе и другу)

This game is pretty old, maybe writing the review now would prove to be redundant but meh I'll do it anyway.

I finished the game in approximately 9 hours. Which is quite longer than most players probably since I'm not exactly smart at these kinds of puzzle games. But that doesn't mean the game made me bored af. The game entertains you in lots of ways. Both from the actual game mechanics and from the snappy retort that Wheatley and GLaDOS spew out without reserve. I don't know if this game is actually comedic but it has some points for giggles, yeah, you'll laugh at yourself for not realizing to put that portal there sooner, or you should place that cube on the button first and then jump, you idiot.

The game's physics and mechanics are awesome, the way it made you fly and stuff, I love it. This game is pretty simple if you ask me, but there are so much combination of stuff going on in one test chamber you need to exploit all these simple things.The puzzle could get tiring somewhat if you have sat for hours without knowing what to do, but in the end you will ALWAYS figure it out. 

There are some test chambers that, when you took your first step in, you'd think to yourself 'what the hell there are so many things going on, what am I supposed to do', and thats why I think the best way of solvng all the puzzle inside this game is through the process of elimination. Try out everything that seems viable and you'll get the answer, eventually.

If you are into puzzle games, I'd definitely recommend this game. 

Oh yeah did I mention you can make your own test chamber and screw yourself up? yeah you can do that.
玩这游戏动用了我所有偷鸡技巧，最后发现还是靠脑子解谜最关键

oyunu daha yeni bitirdim ve şuan ıhg ıhg (hıçkırıg agalma bişey ) gerçektende sonu çok duygulandırdı ancak spoylır vermiyecegim offf gene oyunun ortasından girdim evet bugünkü oyunumuz portal 2 şimdi oyunun 1 incisini oynamadım oynasam bile bitirmedim ve hikayeyi tam bilmiyorum (BURASI SPOLİER İÇERMEK TEDİR İSTEMİYORSANIZ ((((( BÖLÜMÜNE KADAR OKUMAYIN ) biz bir test labaatuvarında denek iz kobay faresi gibi ve burdan kaçmak için yanımıza bir adet robot geliyor bize yardım ediyor ve baş robotu yok etmek istiyoruz 2 li beraber odaları geçerler ve kaçmaya çalışırlar bazen aksiyon bazen gizem ama aralarında sıcak bir bag oluşur ve baş robotu alt ederler başrobot yerine laboatuvarı yönetmesi için arkadaş robot geçer ve bu gücü görüdügünde bizi satar (isimleri hatırlamıyorm :( ) ardından baş robotu patetese çevirir ve ikili yeniden test odaları geçer laboatuvarın iç kısımlarında gezer sonra diger robotan intikam alır ((((((( çok kıytırık bir seneryo deyilmi tahmin edilebilir ve oyun size devamında ne olacak diye degil sadece sonunu merak etiriyor sırf pc de yer açılsın diye oyunu hızlı hızlı yapamya çalıştım ve çok zor malesef çok fazla video izliyeret testleri başardım testler güzel portal silahımız var bunu kulanarak testleri geçiyoruz çok fazla test var oynanış güzel aksiyon güzel böyle bir oyuna göre ama seneryo çok berbat abi sanki sadece bu bölümü geç dahasına karışma diyor gaben reyiz oyuncu: abi seneryo çok kötü gaben : sus sus al coop oyna evet oyunda coop ta var 2 kişi olup kendi ayrı bir seneryosu var çok bişey degil 2 robotsunuz ve bölümleri geçiyorsunuz coop seneryoyu tamamlamadım oyuncu : abi coop sürekli kendini tekrar ediyor başka bişey yok gaben: lan sus al bölüm yaratma evet oyunda bölüm yaratmada var bölümler yaratıp arkadaşlarınıza paylaşa biliyorsunuz ve genelde bu bölümler çok sadisçe tasarlanıyor yada bana öyle gelidi oyuncu : abi coop taki robotlar çok kötü görünüyor gaben : al robot çıkartma bölümü gibi bişey robotunuza bişeyler ekliyorsunuz ancak şunu söyliyim tam anlamadım bu sistemi ve başka bahsedilecek bişey kalmadı sanırım yanlız oyunu yerden yere vursamda oyun güzel evet yigidi öldür ama hakını yeme demişler oyun güzel off gerçektende çok uzatmışım ama daha anlatmadıgım çok şeyvar herneyse oyuna puanım 10 üzerinden 8 alın güzel bir deneyim
Oynarken delirdim resmen tavsiye ederim

单人剧情通关后感想：
主剧情，比较烧脑，这便是对这个游戏比较直观的映像，利用了不同的角度去解决问题，在通关走到出口的时候，实在是佩服制作组的用苦良心，不同的剧情阶段对应着不同类型的关卡，难度也随之递增。
实在为不可多得的好游戏。
YES
Comparing to Portal, this game makes a great improvement. From the story, gameplay, and features, this one is awesome to play.
Годная хуйня
并不是太难，而是要注意到每一处的东西并合理利用就行。最后通关后她我把我送走了，但我还很想念她啊
태도가 싹 바뀌는 감자도스
Für mich eines der besten Spiele ever! Ein muss für jeden Sciencefictionfan. Dazu gibt es eine Menge Humor und eine hinreißende Story. Bitte dritter Teil! ;)

Richtig gutes Spiel hat man über 10 Stunden Spielspaß mit kleinen witzigen Sachen wie Poster in einem Büro im Gebäude in den letzteren Leveln. Dabei es nicht mehr das neueste ist , ist die Grafik echt gelungen! Es ist sein Geld wert!

Einer der BESTEN Games in meiner Bibliothek und dieses Spiel gehört auch aufjedenfall zu den Klassischen Steam Games. Die Story ist einfach unglaublich und man kann nichts falch machen wenn man dieses Spiel kauft. Es gibt sehr viel Humor und Action in diesem Spiel und die Grafik ist eig. auch Top, obwohl es eher ein altes Spiel ist. Der Ko-Op Modus ist auch einer der besten sachen und ist sehr sehr lustig! Mein freund hat sich wegen mir auch dieses Spiel im Sommer Sale geholt (2€) damit wir dieses Spiel zusammen spielen können! 10/10

Un jeu excelament génial, On se prend trés vite au jeu et on en décroche plus !
La difficulté des pieces pour rejoindre la sortie est graduellement difficile et particulièrement bien trouvé.
On se demande avec une petite impatience ce qu'y nous attend dans la prochaine.
J'ai pris enormement de plaisir à resoudre les "Enigmes" des trés nombreuses pieces et passage qui découle d'une histoire tres interessante à découvrir.

Un 2em opus qui s'integre tres bien au premier, Du coup avec le recul, on prend le premier comme un bon entrainement pour continuer avec le 2em volet, dans lequel la difficulté est d'entrée un cran au dessus et qui continue à croître, tout cela en un décor riche et superbement bien détaillé.
La bande son, l'ambiance et Le doublage des voix sont une reussites. C'est +drôle encore que dans le premier.
On souri tout au long de l'histoire tant les dialogues sont désopilantes, ce qui rend les robots à la fois attachants et détéstables, Moi j'adore !

Je ne veut pas "spoiler", je vais donc juste dire : "Les peintures!  c'est énorme !"

Je ne peux que le recommandé fortement car c'est un vrai bonheur d'y jouer. Pour ceux pour qui cela n'est pas le cas, ben tanpis pour eux! c'est qu'ils n'ont rien compris ! et qu'ils ne comprennent rien à rien et c'est dommage d'être aussi bête.
Un jeu x2 plus long que le premier mais J'adore ce jeu (1er fini en 4h, 2em fini en 9h lol), j'attend avec impatience le 3em opus  et j'espere qu'ils vont mettre le paquet cette fois!!!

ps: je ne fais partie d'aucune société, je ne suis pas payé, je n'ai pas eu le jeu gratuitement, j'ai réellement adoré ce jeu tout comme le premier
Топ
Слишком легко, а сюжетка топовая.

[h1]Super Koop Spiel![/h1]

Wer ein Koop Spiel sucht, bei dem auch ein bisschen Action vorhanden ist, sollte definitiv zuschlagen. 
Der Einzelspieler ist eher auf eine Story aufgebaut, der Mehrspieler besteht nur aus Tests ohne richtige Story. 

Das Spielprinzip besteht darin zum Ausgang zu kommen. Dafür muss man Portale setzen (deshalb der Name ^-^). Durch die Portale kann man entweder selbst gehen oder z. B. einen Laser leiten.

Einzige Sache, die ich nicht verstehe:
Wie kann man Gesten auf der Tastatur machen? Auf dem Controller ist es klar.

Mit Tastatur macht das Spielen mehr Spaß als mit Controller/Gamepad. Man kann sich mit der Tastatur einfach flüssiger bewegen.
Esse jogo é delicioso demais!!! super recomendo!!!
Отличная игракак для двоих так и для одного игрока. Как раз после прохождения серии half-life , я увидел в portal ту же Гр. Пушку, а так же знакомый всем игровой движок

Pros
-charming characters or robots like Wheatley and Glados
-small hints to half life
-better graphics than the first one
-Puzzles that are not too hard nor too easy
-unexpected twists
-new mechanics like the light bridges and gels 
-course maker and workshop support to make levels and share it 
Cons
-too many segmants where you have to find the next white portal bloch to the next white Bloch 
-useless or too much story segmants
-not that much replay value

[u] [b] Positives: [/b] [/u]
+	Portal’s setting is fleshed out with some amazing new characters and a larger perspective of the Aperture Science facility. The story is also more entertaining and has higher stakes than ever.
+	Many new gameplay elements expand the sandbox of the puzzles, and keep them unpredictable throughout the majority of the game.
+	There’s an abundance of content due to Co-op and Community Created levels!

[u] [b] Negatives: [/b] [/u]
-	The beautiful, detailed environments sometimes compete for attention with the puzzles themselves, causing a few areas to be really confusing for no real reason.
(Ex: You enter an enormous cavern with impressive-looking puzzle locations all around you going into the distance, but after a long search for where to advance, you find that you’re just supposed to leave through one of the ordinary little doors right next to you)

[u] [b] Overall: [/b] [/u]
If you enjoyed the first Portal then absolutely get Portal 2! It expands the gameplay and story in fascinating new directions, and is almost perfect in its execution!

Puzzles dinâmicos que desafiam o raciocínio lógico, personagens adoravelmente sarcásticos e uma trilha sonora incrível. Na metade da campanha o jogo pode parecer meio repetitivo, mas ele se recompõe totalmente lá pelo final e vale cada centavo gasto.

Amazing coop game, that you can play with a friend! 
Highly Recommend to people who likes puzzles!
good

Ставлю "палец вверх", но по баллам будет где-то 7 из 10.

Два главных для меня минуса:
1) Мне не нравится, что игровые персонажи постоянно "сверлят" мне мозг, без остановки повторяя, какое я ничтожество и чмо. Я понимаю, что это такой юмор, и поначалу меня это веселило. Но когда эти подколки продолжились спустя полчаса игры, час, два... Это уже не смешно, это просто надоедает и оказывает негативное влияние на настроение.
2) Я не знаю, до середины дошел, или уже ближе к концу, или только в начале? Мне нравится проходить разные комнаты испытаний, но меня сильно раздражает беготня по тоннелям и прочим серым локациям, когда непонятно куда в этот раз надо попасть.
Вместо поиска решения задачи, приходится тратить время на понимание "куда теперь вообще идти?" Это совсем не интересно.

Но сама идея с порталами очень сильная, необычная. Игра не зря стала знаковой.
Отдохну от угнетающего юмора - вернусь и доиграю. :)

I've beaten this game 11 times, mostly on my old PS3, but still the same game. I might just be fuckin weird, but Portal 2 has never lost any entertainment value through all of my playthroughs. Not my all time favorite game, but probably one of the greatest puzzle games ever made. 10/10 would Volvo again.

This is on of the best games i ever played!

La secuela de "Portal" que mejora en _TODO_ a su antecesor, tanto en extensión, como en técnica y narrativamente. Es un _IMPRESCINDIBLE_ en la biblioteca de todo jugador, ya que este juego, engancha.

Me he completado el juego y no he sufrido ni un solo bug. Esto denota la calidad del producto y el cuidado de los desarrolladores por este juego.

Uno de los mejores juegos que se pueden comprar en Steam, sin duda alguna.

En periodo de ofertas puedes encontrar el pack con los dos juegos de Portal (1 y 2) por algo más de 2 EUR, un precio imbatible que no deja escusas para tener esta joya.

portale i portale i chuj

Portal 2 è magnifico, spettacolare, un capolavoro. L'ho apprezzato moltissimo e non posso fare a meno di rigiocarlo ogni tanto perchè merita davvero. Ha una trama minuziosamente dettagliata, ora ansiosa, ora comica, ora commuovente e malinconica, molti colpi di scena, personaggi unici e diversi tra loro che si distinguono per il proprio carattere, messo in risalto da un doppiaggio veramente azzeccato, la vastità della mappa e la diversità delle varie camere di test è impressionante. Se dopo aver finito il gioco vi sentite un po' vuoti, provate la co-op, veramente carina e ben studiata, che non cade mai nella banalità, la cui fine potrebbe rivelare qualcosa in più rispetto alla trama principale a mio parere
simple i like the game

Jogo ótimo pra pensar um pouco e resolver puzzles extremamente complicados. Jogar com amigos no modo co-op é a melhor coisa, fazendo vocês se juntarem pra resolver enigmas complicados (dependendo da fase que você esteja) Enfim, é um jogo muito bom, ainda mais pra mim, que, paguei apenas 3,49 por ele. (Também comprei pro meu amigo jogar comigo ;v) 10/10, recomendado!

Wheatly真可爱！可爱死了！！！虽然XX了但也很可爱！！！！我原先从来没觉得英音哪里性感，直到我听见他说话。声音超好听啊有木有。。。

游戏性很强，剧情虽然不复杂但是让人挺感动。考虑到我是花6块钱买的，真是太值了。。。

Divertido jogar com amigos e desafiador. Porém o multiplayer é bastante curto.
O jogo tem tradução e tem uma história interessante até, mas o destaque do jogo é, sem dúvidas, os puzzles. 
É possível no multiplayer criar fases e jogar fases de outros, e isso com certeza estende o gameplay.
Buen juego para pensar y aun mejor para divertirse un rato con UN amigo

This is one of my favorite game ever! I played 500 workshop maps and i will never stop with it :D

Another great game made by valve. Portal 2 took all the things that made portal great and made them better. This game has great gameplay, a great story and probably the best villain ever. I had a lot of fun playing this game. 100% recommended.
VERY ADDICTING !!
круто и прикольно

10/10
~5-20 hours (for first playthrough depending on how good you are at puzzles)
What to say about one of the greatest games of all time? It's a classic for a reason. If you've never tried Portal, just do it. Great soundtrack, humor, voice acting, an expanded story from the previous game, and an enjoyable puzzle experience make this game simply one of the best. You will definitely not regret it!
You don't have to play Portal 1 to play this game, but why wouldn't you? It is also incredibly fun.

portal 2 is honestly one of the best gsmes i have ever played its emersive humours and fun i absolutly reccomend portal 2 if you havent played although i did have a croptuted save state and had to restart a chapter i dont care its an exellent game

Portal 2 ist ein grandioser Titel, den jeder mal gespielt haben sollte. Die Steurung und die Story sind ausgereicht und technisch funktioniert alles gut. Selbst auf meinem leistungsschwachen Laptop läuft das Spiel auf einer ansehnlichen Grafik.
Ich empfehle dieses Spiel, weil es spass macht relativ gewaltlos und ein gutes Einsteigerspiel ist!
玩Portal 2 简直 就 是 大脑在 旋转，创意实在是太棒了！！！

好游戏经历了时间的考验。原版的剧情地图可圈可点，解谜环节妙趣横生，背景音乐则是聊胜于无。😓甚至有点辣耳朵。最嗨皮的就是这样的好游戏居然支持创意工坊!!无尽的解谜等着你。不过工坊里的地图普遍比原版偏难，比较需要思考。
不过，缺点也很明显，3D眩晕患者慎入，网速差的大兄弟慎入。我已经到了一步一卡的境地了，不知道是为什么。嗨呀，1*2一起买更便宜哟。
one of my favorite games you need to use you're brain
Un jeu a ne pas rater.
